How to find us

The Centre for Mathematics (CMS) is located on Wilberforce Road (CB3 0WA), off Madingley Road. The centre may also be reached from Clarkson Road, off Grange Road. Zoom in on the map below for bike and car parking.

The University Map centred on the CMS

Bus services serving CMS

  • Universal - The University bus service can be used by anyone. It links the railway station with CMS. Links to the timetable and route map can be found on the University's bus page. It costs £1 for University members and £2 for everyone else.
  • Stagecoach run the C4 (Citi 4) service from Cambridge city bus station. These buses go down Madingley Road passing CMS. (Timetable , Route).
  • Stagecoach routemaps, city bus station layout and timetable links (right hand side).
  • The X5 service runs between Oxford and Cambridge. It is a limited stop service with stops very close to CMS (Bulstrode Gardens). If coming from the Oxford direction, alight at the first stop after Madingley Road Park and Ride, cross the road and walk in the direction the bus was travelling; within just a couple of minutes is Wilberforce Road, the turn to CMS. To return, turn left out of Wilberforce Road and walk to the Bulstrode Gardens stop.
  • Whippet bus service 1 departs from the city centre and stop at the Madingley Road stops close to CMS. This has a quicker route to Madingley Road than the C4 but come less frequently. There is also the Whippet X3.

Arriving By Car

  • Our building is close to the M11 motorway (exit at Junction 13).
  • Please note parking on site is very limited and must be arranged in advance of visiting.
  • Limited parking is also available on nearby streets.
  • Madingley Road Park and Ride (CB3 0EX) is about a mile away from CMS. Coach parking is available there.
  • Map showing CMS location and Park and Ride.

Arriving By Taxi

Ask for Clarkson Road from Cambridge. Walk up the path between the Isaac Newton Institute and Wolfson Court (Girton). Turn left at the Gatehouse and walk straight towards the CMS central core where Reception is located.

Madingley Road Park and Ride

  • The Madingley Road Park and Ride is just one mile from the Centre for Mathematical Sciences.
  • The Uni 4 bus which also serves CMS stops there.
  • The Park and Ride site is between the motorway turnoff and the Centre for Mathematical Sciences.
  • Cambridge Park and Ride sites

From the Railway Station

  • Cambridge railway station is about 3 miles from CMS.
  • There is a taxi rank at Cambridge rail station. There are two roads around the Centre for Mathematical Sciences. Clarkson Road averages about 50p cheaper than Wilberforce Road. Sometimes the taxi drivers give you the choice. The fare is usually in the region of £8.00 to £9.00 during the day.
  • From the train station: the Uni 4 bus service links the nearby Brooklands Avenue with CMS.
  • Or for a journey with less walking, catch one of the many buses from the railway station to the city centre and then transfer onto the C4 route. The C4 stops outside CMS. Linkto C4 route maps and timetables (right hand side).

Coming by Coach

  • Many coach services stop at Parkside. A few minutes walk will take you to the C4 bus stop.

Further Travel Information

Arriving at the Site

Wilberforce Road Entrance

Follow the signs for CMS reception. Cycle parking is provided in designated areas in the carpark.

Clarkson Road Entrance

Follow the lane-way, turn left at the Gatehouse and CMS centre core where reception is located is right in front of you. Cycle parking is provided outside the Gatehouse.
